# pie-demo



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                | Type      |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `config`         | `config`          | The item config to use. If not defined, config will be retrieved from `/demo/config.js` path for npm package on unpkg.com. | `string`  |
| `editor`         | `editor`          | Include an editor in the view                                                                                              | `boolean` |
| `pie`            | `pie`             | The PIE npm package to demo. e.g. `@pie-elements/multiple-choice`                                                          | `string`  |
| `playerControls` | `player-controls` | Include control panel for adjusting player settings.                                                                       | `boolean` |
| `preview`        | `preview`         | Include an item preview in the view                                                                                        | `boolean` |
